committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Insurance

official_title: To provide financial institution regulators with whistleblower protection.
short_title: Financial Institution Regulator Whistleblower Protection Act of 1991

summary.text: Financial Institution Regulator Whistleblower Protection Act of 1991 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prohibit any insured depository institution or Federal banking regulatory agency from taking any reprisal action against an employee who has reported possible violations of Federal banking laws.

titles.title: Financial Institution Regulator Whistleblower Protection Act of 1991
To provide financial institution regulators with whistleblower protection.
